column5: Before - roll, on count, one two, three, x-ray, tray, board, FAST
column6: X-Ray plates are put under the patient mostly when the patient is rolled for back exam. Once the x-ray has been completed, they discuss about the x-ray and any wounds, abrasions found. FAST exam is done sometimes and the result is mentioned (negative or positive)
